thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Absolutely love these type of puzzles. My four year old granddaughter even tries to do the 1,000 piece puzzles with the variety of colors and pictures on each puzzle. I wish they made this type in kid size format such as a 100 piece option with the same pictures.
